thread.title: Santini The Great Releases Official Single DREAM
thread.title_full: Santini The Great Releases Official Single DREAM | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Santini The Great Releases Official Single DREAM
text:
(MENAFN Press) earcandy-records.com ST. LOUIS - Oct. 13 2015 - PRLog -- Santini The Great was born & raised in St. Louis Missouri. The city that brought you multi platinum artist Chingy J-Kwon St. Lunatics and Nelly. Santini The Great brings a unique style and lyrical delivery to Hip Hop.His hit single "Dream" from his much anticipated album "Audio Meth" has become increasingly popular and capturing new fans across the globe. "Dream" has over 900 detections on monitored internet and FM airplay in Europe.Santini The Great has the hip hop entertainment industry buzzing for more."Dream" is available on iTunes Amazon Spotify and the much anticipated album "Audio Meth" is on all digital outlets.Connect with Santini The Great:https://twitter.com/SantiniTHEgreathttps://soundcloud.com/santinimusicConnect with EarCandy Records LLC:http://www.earcandy-records.com/home.htmlhttps://twitter.com/EarCandyRecordshttps://www.facebook.com/EarCandyRecordsLLCRadio Airplay Now has over 60 years combined experience and helped thousands of artist with national radio airplay and promotional services. RAN campaigns have resulted in major label singings world tours investors label distribution increase sales and national charting on DRT Mediabase and Billboard.For more information please log onto http://www.radioairplaynow.net or call us at 800.419.5394. ContactRadio Airplay Now Inc.***aol.com--- End ---
